title: Christophe Galtier - Wikipedia
snippet: Christophe Galtier (French pronunciation: [kʁistɔf ɡaltje]; born 23 August 1966) is a French professional football manager and former player who is the head coach of Saudi Pro League club Neom. A defender, Galtier spent many of his 15 years as a player at Marseille with spells at six other ...

title: Christophe Galtier | Football Wiki | Fandom
snippet: A defender, Galtier was a journeyman professional who spent many of his 15 years as a player at Marseille with spells at six other clubs, four in France and one each in Italy and China.

title: Christophe Galtier - Age, Family, Bio | Famous Birthdays
snippet: Before guiding Lille and other clubs to success, Galtier spent 15 years playing pro soccer, mostly as a defender for his hometown Marseille club.
